about_the_game:
BECOME THE OWNER OF A SNAKE RANCH

As a small dragon, raise your ranch from the ground up. Gather and manage resources, build different facilities to house your snakes and make sure they are cared for to keep them happy and collect their beautiful scales.

DISCOVER A VARIETY OF FASCINATING SNAKES

Each one of the buildings can house different types of snakes and each one sheds a different scale. Their scales can be used to construct new buildings, craft better tools and equipment or be sold for gold. From horned snakes, to ones with wheels and even wings, there will be plenty of slithering friends to make.

AUTOMATE YOUR TASKS 

Even a very motivated and talented dragon cannot do it all on their own. Most of the species of snakes can help you manage your ranch, be it by helping you feed other snakes, carrying their scales to storages, felling trees, hunting for food, forging new equipment and even cooking. 

ORGANIZE EXPEDITIONS TO FIND RARE MATERIALS

Send your fighter and gatherer snakes to explore new lands and collect rare resources and food. Some of the areas will be underwater or high in the sky and others will be too hot or too cold. Equip your scaly explorers to help them battle the elements or employ specialized species to get the job done. 

PLAN AROUND TIME, WEATHER AND CHANGING SEASONS

Take time into account and make sure your snakes needs are met each day. Be prepared for weather that can affect your snakes work and changing seasons that bring new mechanics to the mix.

RESEARCH & DEVELOPMENT

Build a lab and with the help of your snakes, perform research to unlock new types of snakes, buildings and improvements for your ranch.

DECORATE AND MAKE IT YOUR OWN

Choose from a variety of decorative items and add your own style to your ranch. Just because you are scaling up, doesn’t mean you cannot do a glow up instead.
